participant_1.background:
I'm lucky to have a family that supports me and my hobbies, even if they don't understand them.
my name is john and i live in dallas , tx.
I try to take my dog on a walk everyday to stay active.
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
I snuggle up with my cat and read Anne of Green Gables.

participant_2.background:
I love the feeling of the wind in my hair when I'm driving my truck.
i like to eat hard boiled eggs.
I live in a house where I'm not allowed to bring my bladed weapons into the kitchen.
lady gaga is my current favorite singer.
my passion is writing.

content.text: I'm John, from Dallas, TX. What's your name?
My name is Sally, it's nice to meet you John!
It's nice to meet you too Sally! What are you passionate about?
I'm passionate about writing! I love to write short stories and poems.
Oh that's really cool! I love to read! What kind of stories do you write?
I write all sorts of stories, but my favorite are fantasy and romance.
Those are my favorite too! I love to get lost in a good book.
Me too! I love to escape from the real world and just get lost in a story.
I'm glad to hear that! What are your favorite books?
I have so many favorite books, but some of my favorites are The Lord of the Rings, Harry Potter, and The Hunger Games.
Oh those are all great books! I love them too!
Me too! They're some of my favorite books of all time.
I'm glad to hear that! What are your favorite things to write about?
I love to write about characters who are going through a lot of struggles and have to overcome them. I also love to write about love and romance
